channel.title: Command help
channel.description: ok i need help making commands only for a certain player. like i have somebody waiting to be co-owner but i dont want them using the giveadmin and givemod commands how would i make those just for me ...

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

well did anyone ask you … i asked for a way to fix the command not your opinon alright.[br][size=1]Posted on: November 08, 2007, 05:40:39 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Waffles!!, post:7, topic:157699”]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”))[/quote]

i made my commands look like that now i get…

^
client.java:11051: <identifier> expected
if(command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnore
Case("pure"))
                     ^
client.java:11051: illegal start of type
if(command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnore
Case("pure"))
                      ^
client.java:11053: illegal start of type
   try {
   ^
client.java:11061: illegal start of type
   } catch(Exception e) {
     ^
client.java:11061: ';' expected
   } catch(Exception e) {
                      ^
client.java:11065: class, interface, or enum expected
else if(command.startsWith("demod") && playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgn
oreCase("pure"))
^
client.java:11067: class, interface, or enum expected
   try {
   ^

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Change the playerRights on the giveadmin and givemod to playerName.

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @adam321 adam321
item.description:
@adam321 wrote:

well i dont know if this is rite or not but u should search for the command on client.java then look at the player rights…if the player rites are 3 then u are fine…if its 2 change it to 3 meaning only the owner is allowed to use those commands…i hope that helped

Read full topic
